verses.text: From \w whence|strong="G4159"\w* \add come\add* \w wars|strong="G4171"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fightings|strong="G3163"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*? \add come they\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w hence|strong="G1782"\w*, \add even\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w lusts|strong="G2237"\w* that \w war|strong="G4754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w*?

Ye \w lust|strong="G1937"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: ye \w kill|strong="G5407"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* desire to \w have|strong="G2206"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cannot|strong="G1410"\w* \w obtain|strong="G2013"\w*: ye \w fight|strong="G3164"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w war|strong="G4170"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

Ye \w ask|strong="G0154"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w because|strong="G1360"\w* ye \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w amiss|strong="G2560"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w consume|strong="G1159"\w* \add it\add* \w upon|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w lusts|strong="G2237"\w*.

Ye \w adulterers|strong="G3432"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w adulteresses|strong="G3428"\w*, know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w friendship|strong="G5373"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w enmity|strong="G2189"\w* with \w God|strong="G2316"\w*? \w whosoever|strong="G3739"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w will|strong="G1014"\w* \w be|strong="G1511"\w* a \w friend|strong="G5384"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w is|strong="G2525"\w* the \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Do|strong="G2228"\w* ye \w think|strong="G1380"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* in \w vain|strong="G2761"\w*, The \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w lusteth|strong="G1971"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w giveth|strong="G1325"\w* \w more|strong="G3173"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*. \w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w resisteth|strong="G0498"\w* the \w proud|strong="G5244"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w giveth|strong="G1325"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* unto the \w humble|strong="G5011"\w*.

Submit \w yourselves|strong="G5293"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w Resist|strong="G0436"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he will \w flee|strong="G5343"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

Draw \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he will draw \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w*. \w Cleanse|strong="G2511"\w* \add your\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \add ye\add* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w purify|strong="G0048"\w* \add your\add* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \add ye\add* double \w minded|strong="G1374"\w*.

Be \w afflicted|strong="G5003"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mourn|strong="G3996"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w weep|strong="G2799"\w*: \w let|strong="G3344"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w laughter|strong="G1071"\w* be \w turned|strong="G3344"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w mourning|strong="G3997"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add your\add* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaviness|strong="G2726"\w*.

Humble \w yourselves|strong="G5013"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he shall \w lift|strong="G5312"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w up|strong="G5312"\w*.

\w Speak|strong="G2635"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w evil|strong="G2635"\w* one of \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*. He \w that|strong="G3588"\w* speaketh \w evil|strong="G2635"\w* \w of|strong="G0080"\w* \add his\add* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w judgeth|strong="G2919"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, speaketh \w evil|strong="G2635"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w judgeth|strong="G2919"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w doer|strong="G4163"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* a \w judge|strong="G2923"\w*.

There \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w lawgiver|strong="G3550"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* is \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w*: \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w judgest|strong="G2919"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*?

Go \w to|strong="G0071"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w ye|strong="G3588"\w* that \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, To \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* to \w morrow|strong="G0839"\w* we will \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w such|strong="G3592"\w* a \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w continue|strong="G4160"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w a|strong="G1520"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* buy and \w sell|strong="G1710"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* get \w gain|strong="G2770"\w*:

\w Whereas|strong="G3748"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1987"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \add shall be\add* on the \w morrow|strong="G0839"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \add is\add* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*? It \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w even|strong="G1063"\w* a \w vapour|strong="G0822"\w*, that \w appeareth|strong="G5316"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* a little \w time|strong="G3641"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w then|strong="G1899"\w* vanisheth \w away|strong="G0853"\w*.

For \w that|strong="G0473"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \add ought\add* to \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w*, we shall \w live|strong="G2198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* ye \w rejoice|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w boastings|strong="G0212"\w*: \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G2746"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* to him that \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \add it\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.
